name: Daggry
description:
This is a short platformer, where you collect flowers so you can save the town of Daggry. While exploring the town, consider having a chat with some of the locals.

Controls:     W/A/S/D, E  and K/L

There is a small bug in this game where you might not be able to move your character when you first load the game, if this happens reload the page and try again, also dont click of the game while you are playing, this will also make you loose control of the character.

If anyone knows why this happens please let me know.
